Detailed Description

Sample in a disk.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

mr::diskSampler::diskSampler (   )  [inline]
 

Constructor. This call is to be used when sampling adaptively (ie. the number of samples to be taken are not known or may vary, or you may exit the loop early).

mr::diskSampler::diskSampler (  const miUint &  numSamples  )  [inline]
 

Constructor. Fixed Sampling. numSamples is the number of samples to take. It HAS to be miUint&
